name: Team Gonna Scream: Covid Clicker
description:
COVID Clicker

Somewhere in a laboratory far, far away, a new strain of COVID is being brewed. can you make it worse than it already is?

A casual clicker game about making COVID spread more than it should.

Don't follow the advice on this one

  • Ryan - Shop Coding
  • Ben - COVID Molecule Model
  • Sam - Trailer and Cover Art
  • Jason - Base Mechanic Coding
  • Hayley - Background Art
